about.title: About me
about.intro: I have always been fascinated by language in all its forms. Thanks to my studies, I discovered a new type of language I have never been interested in before : computer language. When I heard about concept like <mlLink>Machine Learning</mlLink> and <dlLink>Deep Learning</dlLink>, I started asking myself questions: how do machines understand us? How do they communicate with us? To answer, I thought "why not try?" And boom: I loved the freedom and creativity this field offers. What I love most is that computing is always evolving. There is always something new to learn and new problems to solve! And that's pretty cool. You can find my CV just below the paragraph if you're interested!

tech.title: The artistic part
tech.intro: Since my earliest childhood, I have a specific relationship with everything all around me - forms, colors, small details that compose everything... The funniest part, is that I have aphantasia : I cannot see anything in my head. If you ask me to imagine an apple, I will basically see the word, if that... However, I love to create things. Adobe CS, Clip Studio Paint, Procreate, Affinity... I tried many different tools to bring my ideas into being. At least, as far as possible. I also gave Blender a try. I am having fun doing art because I am really creative despite my lack of visualization. Notwithstanding, it does never prevent me creating everything I want to. For that matter, you can cast an eye over my Instagram. I sometimes post WebComics when I have time!

chill.title: The relax part
chill.intro: Sometimes, you learn more about someone by discovering what they like and enjoy. Therefore, just below, I have selected some things I like : a playlist with different songs I use to listen, a review of my favourite game and a review of the movie I love the most.
